title: Mini-Ep 115: Friendship Questions with Danielle Bayard Jackson
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 115: Friendship Questions with Danielle Bayard Jackson
itunes:subtitle: On this mini-episode, Kate and Doree invite certified friendship coach Danielle Bayard Jackson (author of Give it a Rest: The Case for Tough Love Friendships) to help answer listener questions about friendship, including how to maintain friendships at ...
description:
On this mini-episode, Kate and Doree invite certified friendship coach Danielle Bayard Jackson (author of Give it a Rest: The Case for Tough Love Friendships) to help answer listener questions about friendship, including how to maintain friendships at different life-stages, when to know if a friendship should end, how to deal with your humble-bragging friend, and so much more.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • INKEYLIST -  Visit theinkeylist.com to get started on your own skincare journey.
  • ROMCOMPODS - Enjoy the feature length romcom podcast you didn’t know you needed until right now. Listen to Honeymoon For One on Spotify, Apple or wherever you get your podcasts.
  • BILLIE - Go to MyBillie.com/FOREVER35 and get your $9 starter kit today. 
  • GRASS ROOTS FARMERS COOPERATIVE - Go to grassrootscoop.com/FOREVER35 for a special, limited time offer of $40 Off, plus Free Shipping!
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • OTHER PEOPLES PROBLEMS PODCAST -  Find Other People’s Problems on the CBC Listen app or wherever you get your podcasts today.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
